Rewards Rate: 10 Fuel Points/₹100 Spent at IndianOil Fuel Stations. 1 Fuel Point/₹100 on Other Eligible Purchases
Reward Redemption: 1 Fuel Point = ₹0.50 When Redeeming at IndianOil Stations

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waived on Spends of ₹1.75 Lakh

product_details: This is a dedicated fuel spends credit card.
Earn accelerated 10 Fuel Points/₹100 at IndianOil fuel stations.
Get 1 Fuel Point/₹100 for other eligible spends.
